name: diaporama
description: Diaporama is an image slideshow engine providing high quality animation effects including Kenburns Effect and GLSL Transitions.

scripts.build:
mkdir -p dist; browserify index.js --s Diaporama | derequire | uglifyjs --preamble '/**
  * diaporama '$(npm view diaporama version)'
  * Gaëtan Renaudeau <renaudeau.gaetan@gmail.com> – https://github.com/gre/diaporama
  */' -m -c > dist/build.min.js
